title: Scrum Poker
subtitle: Product Design
greetingText: Scrum Poker is a add-on for Jira and Confluence for estimate software development tasks playing a Planning Poker® game technique
detailsText: No more physical card set needed in your sprint planning sessions! Select your favorite card set, record your estimates, and play Planning Poker® in one app.
detailsText2: I worked on the redesign and adaptation of the app, in also the addition of new features.
contributionList: Mockup design: provide the Invision prototype and Sketch files
